Title: Metro English Persian Dictionary
Description: This is an English - Persian (Farsi) dictionary designed and developed for Windows 8 Metro User Interface which contains over 50000 words.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is an English - Persian (Farsi) dictionary designed and developed for Windows 8 Metro User Interface.

Features:
- Designed specifically for Windows 8 Metro.
- Contains over 50000 English words along with their translation in Persian (Farsi).
- Full support of Windows 8 Search Charm.
